languages.text: "Твои слова подобны глотку свежего воздуха, элантах. Я о них позабочусь".

traits.locale_text: "Твои слова подобны глотку свежего воздуха, элантах. Я о них позабочусть".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Your words are like a breath of fresh air, elantach. I will take good care of them."
languages.original_text: "Твои слова подобны глотку свежего воздуха, элантах. Я о них позабочусь".

languages.text: 「お前の言葉は新鮮な空気のようだ、エランタ。大事に扱わせてもらおう」
languages.original_text: "Your words are like a breath of fresh air, elantach. I will take good care of them."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言葉は新鮮な空気のようだ、エランタ。大事に扱わせてもらおう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tus palabras son un soplo de aire fresco, elantach. Cuidaré bien de ellas».
languages.original_text: "Your words are like a breath of fresh air, elantach. I will take good care of them."

traits.locale_text: «Tus palabras son un soplo de aire fresco, elantach. Cuidaré bien de ellas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “外界人，你的话语令人如沐春风。我会好好保管它们的。”
languages.original_text: "Your words are like a breath of fresh air, elantach. I will take good care of them."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，你的话语令人如沐春风。我会好好保管它们的。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vos paroles sont comme une brise légère, elantach. J'en prendrai grand soin. »
languages.original_text: "Your words are like a breath of fresh air, elantach. I will take good care of them."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles sont comme une brise légère, elantach. J'en prendrai grand soin. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Worte sind wie die frische Morgenluft, Elantach. Ich werde mich gut darum kümmern."
languages.original_text: "Your words are like a breath of fresh air, elantach. I will take good care of them."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Worte sind wie die frische Morgenluft, Elantach. Ich werde mich gut darum kümmern."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Dediklerinle rahat bir nefes aldırdın elantach. Taşlara gözüm gibi bakacağım."
languages.original_text: "Your words are like a breath of fresh air, elantach. I will take good care of them."
